H0.text: What name is given to the study of insects . Entomology

H1.text: What name is given to the study of insects . Insectology

H2.text: What name is given to the study of insects . Arthropodology

H3.text: What name is given to the study of insects . Bugology

A4.text: Entomology is the branch of zoology that focuses on insects.

A5.text: The field is also referred to as insectology in American English, while in British English insectology implies the study of the relationships between insects and humans.
